pageContent: Purpose: The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite is a validated health related quality of life instrument that is commonly administered after prostate cancer treatment. We classified Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite-Short Form sexual summary scores into clinically meaningful groups.

metaData.source:
Geometric evaluation of systematic transrectal ultrasound guided prostate biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23088974/
